title: Imagine
lyrics_snippet: Imagine all the people living life in peace

title: Let It Be
lyrics_snippet: When I find myself in times of trouble Mother Mary comes to me

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
lyrics_snippet: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?

title: Hallelujah
lyrics_snippet: I heard there was a secret chord that David played and it pleased the Lord

title: Hey Jude
lyrics_snippet: Hey Jude, don't make it bad take a sad song and make it better
